channel.title: As Seen on TV on Hugo Curate

item.title: Where Does Host of the Great British Baking Show, Noel Fielding Get His Amazing Sweaters??
item.description: Every time I watch the Great British Baking Show I want to know where the heck Noel Fielding gets his amazing clothes, especially his sweaters. And I just realized that everyone else wants to know too! There’s an entire instagram account devoted to his wardrobe. I was delighted to find some gorgeous merino in the mix. Here are some of the brands making Noel’s cool sweaters. Wah Wah This Australian brand is truly niche – turning punk album artwork into wearable art with fine merino wool and unforgettable designs.
